mapper.insert: insert into role_zhuangbei_ms (id, roleId, wqId, name, wqXiaoGuo, status, type, date, baoShi1, baoShi2, baoShi3, level, miaoShu, xiaoGuo, powerNum, wuQiName, roleLevel, wuqiType, imgUrl) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wqid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wqxiaoguo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baoshi1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baoshi2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baoshi3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{miaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xiaoguo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{powernum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wuqiname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rolelevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wuqitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select * from role_zhuangbei_ms re where id not in (SELECT id FROM role_zhuangbei_ms r where r.baoShi1 is not null and r.baoShi2 is not null and r.baoShi3 is not null) and roleid=#{roleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT kangXing,count(kangXing) num,sum(xiaoGuo)kangXingTotal FROM baoshi b where id in(#{0,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{1,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{2,jdbcType=INTEGER}) group by kangXing
